author: Special Correspondent
text: A set of 2,396 electronic voting machines have arrived here for use in seven constituencies in the forthcoming Assembly election. The Collector, V. Rajaraman, who inspected the EVMs on Wednesday, said that the machines would be kept with round-the-clock security. The post-2006 units were transported to Virudhunagar from Ahmedabad.
title: EVMs arrive in Virudhunagar
